title: The Invisible Layer
description: Going forth in an ever expanding reality, Acoustic Funambulist's journey takes the turns of his own artistry, pushing beyond the limits of the known universe.In this tenth episode, the aerialist faces the obstacle of his own stubbornness anchored in a past that is no longer relevant.Already - The hair of the comet- Five minutes to Doomsday- Perpetual emotion- The Uneventful Galaxy- The pragmatic hitchhiker- Messy Christmas- The Reincarnation Office- Pole shifts- Be God to Yourself
author: Jean-Yves Crozier
